arts.ttl: Atletico Madrid and Inter set to compete for Atalanta’s Isak Hien
arts.sum: LaLiga outfits Atletico Madrid and Serie A giants Inter are in pursuit of Atalanta’s Isak Hien. According to a report by Tutto Atalanta, Atletico Madrid and Inter are gearing up…

arts.ttl: Simeone highlights “drop in energy” following winter break as Atlético prepare for Marbella
arts.sum: “It’s time for the Copa del Rey and we will face a team that is improving in terms of results, changing the way they play and we hope to do it in the best way possible.” Atlético Madrid coach Diego Simeone spoke to the press for the first time in 2025 on Friday as he previewed the trip to Málaga to take on Marbella in the Copa del Rey in their first action of the new year.

arts.ttl: Friday's Transfer Talk Update: Marcus Rashford, Alexander Sorloth, Antoine Griezmann
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up the latest confirmed transfer news and speculation from across the footballing world.
